tool.name: metilene
tool.description: calling differentially methylated regions from bisulfite sequencing data
tool.command:
## preprocessing ## generate metilene_g1_g2.input from multiple bedgraph files metilene_input.pl --in1 '$opt_in1' --in2 '$opt_in2' >/dev/null ##2>/dev/null && ## metilene main program metilene -M $Options.opt_M -m $Options.opt_m -d $Options.opt_d -t \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} #if $B: -f 2 -B "$B" #else: -f 1 #end if #if $Options.Y: -Y $Options.Y #end if #if $Options.X: -X $Options.X #end if
-v $Options.opt_v metilene_g1_g2.input > '$output_bedlike' ##2> /dev/null && ## postprocessing cut -f1-4 $output_bedlike > $output_bedgraph 2>/dev/null && ## write to job directory metilene_output.pl -q '$output_bedlike' -p 0.05 -o ./metilene ##>/dev/null ##2>/dev/null

param.name: opt_in1
param.label: Input group 1
param.help: Set of sorted bedgraph/bed input profiles of group 1

param.name: opt_in2
param.label: Input group 2
param.help: Set of sorted bedgraph/bed input profiles of group 2

param.label: BED file containing regions of interest
param.help: Regions that should be checked for differential methylation.

param.name: opt_M
param.label: The allowed nt distance between two CpGs within a DMR

param.name: opt_m
param.label: The minimum # of CpGs in a DMR
Specify how many replicates must contain data for a certain CpG position in group 1
Specify how many replicates must contain data for a certain CpG position in group 2

param.name: opt_d
param.label: The minimum mean methylation difference for calling DMRs

validator.message: Valley filter value must be in [0,1].

tool.help:
**Fast and sensitive calling of differentially methylated regions from bisulfite sequencing data**
Detailed documentation of the stand-alone tool metilene is available at .. __: http://www.bioinf.uni-leipzig.de/Software/metilene/manual.pdf
The software metilene is available for download at .. __: http://www.bioinf.uni-leipzig.de/Software/metilene/
